engine_status: V2 CYCLE 5 COMPLETE -- YC-GRANULARITY BUSINESS MODEL DECOMPOSITION. 11 sectors decomposed into 102 specific, buildable business models. Each scored independently on 5 axes (competitive density, unit economics, distribution, moat, customer findability) using web search for ACTUAL competitors. TOP 5: (1) AI Bookkeeping for Bench Orphans (80), (2) Acquire-and-Modernize CA CNC Shop (80), (3) Acquire-and-Modernize CA Wholesale Bakery (77), (4) AI Prior Auth Appeals for Practices (75), (5) AI Bookkeeping for Restaurants (75). KEY INSIGHT: Best opportunities are UNDERSERVED NICHES within competitive sectors, not sector-level plays. Dead business revival (Bench orphans) is the single most actionable pattern. 5 models NOT recommended due to competitive saturation. NEW PATTERN P-015: Niche segmentation reveals hidden opportunity structure.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: AI Bookkeeping for Orphaned Bench Customers
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: Full-service AI bookkeeping for 35K businesses stranded by Bench's Dec 2024 collapse. $149/mo. AI-first (no offshore human labor = Bench's failure mode solved). 90% gross margin.
decomposed_models_top_20.entry_wedge: Bench customer communities on Reddit, Twitter, Facebook
decomposed_models_top_20.key_competitor: Kick ($3M), Otterz ($5M) -- neither targeting Bench orphans specifically
decomposed_models_top_20.why_now: 35K orphaned customers with PROVEN willingness to pay. Bench revived by Employer.com but degraded service quality. Window closing as customers settle elsewhere.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: Acquire-and-Modernize: CA CNC Machine Shop
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: Acquire retiring-owner CNC shop ($1-3M revenue) at 3-4x EBITDA. Modernize with cobots ($200-400K). SBA 504 financing. 25-30% COGS reduction.
decomposed_models_top_20.entry_wedge: BizBuySell CA manufacturing listings + broker relationships
decomposed_models_top_20.key_competitor: No well-funded competitor at this scale. General Catalyst targets $100M+ EBITDA.
decomposed_models_top_20.why_now: SBA 504 fee waiver expires Sept 30, 2026. Silver Tsunami creating acquisition supply. Cobot ROI proven (8-14 months).

decomposed_models_top_20.name: Acquire-and-Modernize: CA Wholesale Bakery
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: Acquire CA wholesale bakery ($1-2M revenue, 300+ store distribution) at 3-4x EBITDA. Cobots for packaging ($150-280K). Margin uplift from 29% to 35-45%.
decomposed_models_top_20.entry_wedge: BizBuySell CA food production listings
decomposed_models_top_20.key_competitor: No competitor at this scale. PE targets larger operations.
decomposed_models_top_20.why_now: SBA 504 + USDA VAPG financing. FSMA 204 compliance creates moat for compliant operators. Specialty food premiums growing.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: AI Prior Auth Appeal Engine for Independent Practices
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: Auto-generates prior auth appeals for independent practices losing $50-100K/yr to denials. $5-15 per appeal. Provider-side arms race triggered by CMS WISeR.
decomposed_models_top_20.entry_wedge: Practices in WISeR pilot states (AZ, NJ, OH, OK, TX, WA)
decomposed_models_top_20.key_competitor: Infinx ($85M enterprise), Valer ($7M). Gap: independent practices underserved.
decomposed_models_top_20.why_now: CMS WISeR launching Jan 2026 = AI-driven denials increasing. AMA: 61% say AI increased denial rates.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: AI Full-Service Bookkeeping for Restaurants
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: Restaurant-specific AI bookkeeping (POS integration, tip tracking, food cost analysis). $129/mo per location. 1M+ independent restaurants underserved.
decomposed_models_top_20.entry_wedge: Toast App Marketplace + Square App Marketplace
decomposed_models_top_20.key_competitor: Restaurant365 ($255M) targets chains only. Independents underserved.
decomposed_models_top_20.why_now: POS marketplace distribution enables low-CAC acquisition. Restaurant365 overkill for single-location independents.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: AI Cross-Border Tax for US-LATAM Businesses
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: AI tax compliance for US-LATAM cross-border businesses (transfer pricing, FBAR, foreign tax credits). $299-999/mo. Bilingual platform. No funded AI-first competitor found.
decomposed_models_top_20.entry_wedge: LATAM founder communities, Hispanic Chamber of Commerce
decomposed_models_top_20.key_competitor: No funded AI-first US-LATAM tax startup found. Big 4 serve large companies only.
decomposed_models_top_20.why_now: Nearshoring trend growing. 150K+ cross-border businesses. Strong founder-market fit (bilingual team, Argentina native).

decomposed_models_top_20.name: AI Billing Denial Prevention for PT Practices
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: Pre-checks PT claims before submission to prevent denials (15-20% denial rate vs 5-10% average). $199-499/mo per clinic. 40K+ PT practices.
decomposed_models_top_20.entry_wedge: APTA (American Physical Therapy Association) channel
decomposed_models_top_20.key_competitor: HealthSpark ($5M) -- clinical focus, not billing. WebPT (Patterson) adding AI slowly.
decomposed_models_top_20.why_now: PT denial rates highest of any specialty. Clear ROI ($30-60K/yr saved per practice).

decomposed_models_top_20.name: AI Bookkeeping for Shopify/E-commerce Sellers
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: E-commerce bookkeeping with native Shopify/Amazon/Stripe integration. $99/mo. Auto-reconciles payouts, tracks COGS/fees, multi-state sales tax.
decomposed_models_top_20.entry_wedge: Shopify App Store listing
decomposed_models_top_20.key_competitor: Finaloop ($35M) is DIRECT competitor. Risk: well-funded.
decomposed_models_top_20.why_now: 2M+ Shopify merchants. E-commerce bookkeeping uniquely painful. Shopify App Store provides distribution.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: Acquire-and-Modernize: Ethnic/Specialty Snack Producer
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: Acquire CA ethnic food producer (Mexican snacks, Asian sauces). Modernize with AI + cobots. Expand distribution via new retail chains and DTC.
decomposed_models_top_20.entry_wedge: BizBuySell CA food production listings
decomposed_models_top_20.key_competitor: No competitor at this scale
decomposed_models_top_20.why_now: Growing Hispanic and Asian food demand. Retiring owners. SBA 504 financing.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: AI Medical Billing for Solo Dental Practices
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: AI billing + insurance verification for independent dental practices (1-3 dentists). $299/mo. Simpler than medical billing = better AI-first target.
decomposed_models_top_20.entry_wedge: Dental associations + supply distributor partnerships
decomposed_models_top_20.key_competitor: Archy ($20M) targets DSOs, not solo practices.
decomposed_models_top_20.why_now: 127K dental practices, majority independent. Archy targeting DSOs leaves solo practices underserved.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: AI Bookkeeping for Agencies & Consultancies
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: AI bookkeeping for agencies with project-based P&L, contractor 1099 management, client profitability tracking. $199/mo.
decomposed_models_top_20.entry_wedge: Agency owner communities (AgencySparks, Bureau of Digital)
decomposed_models_top_20.key_competitor: Pilot (acquired Decimal) but not focused on agencies.
decomposed_models_top_20.why_now: 500K+ agencies need project-based accounting. Generic tools don't handle it.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: Multi-CNC Shop Rollup Platform
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: Acquire 3-5 CNC shops, standardize on common cobot/AI stack. Cross-sell customers, purchasing scale. $5-10M total.
decomposed_models_top_20.entry_wedge: Sequential acquisitions from BizBuySell + broker network
decomposed_models_top_20.key_competitor: General Catalyst doing this at $100M+ scale. Gap at $5-10M.
decomposed_models_top_20.why_now: PE rollup trend validates model. SBA 504 fee waiver. Silver Tsunami supply.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: AI Food Safety Compliance Platform (FSMA 204)
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: SaaS for SMB food producers to comply with FSMA 204 food traceability rule (enforceable 2026). $200-500/mo.
decomposed_models_top_20.entry_wedge: FDA compliance deadline creates urgency
decomposed_models_top_20.key_competitor: FoodLogiQ ($50M+) targets enterprise. SMB gap.
decomposed_models_top_20.why_now: FSMA 204 enforcement starting 2026. Deadline pressure. SMB food producers unprepared.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: AI Compliance Monitor for Healthcare AI Deployers
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: Platform tracking 250+ state AI healthcare bills, mapping to AI systems, generating compliance docs. $500-2,000/mo.
decomposed_models_top_20.entry_wedge: Healthcare AI companies facing compliance uncertainty
decomposed_models_top_20.key_competitor: No dominant player in AI-specific healthcare compliance.
decomposed_models_top_20.why_now: 33 laws signed across 21 states in 2025. Compliance burden accelerating.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: AI Production Scheduling for Job Shops
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: AI scheduling replacing whiteboards for CNC/fabrication job shops. $500-2,000/mo. Optimizes machine allocation and delivery estimation.
decomposed_models_top_20.entry_wedge: Partner with job shop ERP providers (JobBOSS, E2) + manufacturer associations
decomposed_models_top_20.key_competitor: LillyWorks (bootstrapped). Only direct AI competitor.
decomposed_models_top_20.why_now: Enterprise scheduling tools don't work for job shops. 30K+ shops stuck on whiteboards.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: AI Quoting Tool for Custom Manufacturers
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: Auto-generates quotes from CAD files for CNC/fabrication. $300-800/mo.
decomposed_models_top_20.entry_wedge: Manufacturing trade shows + ERP integrations
decomposed_models_top_20.key_competitor: Paperless Parts ($46M) is direct. Fictiv ($192M) is marketplace model.
decomposed_models_top_20.why_now: Manual quoting takes hours. AI can reduce to minutes.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: Bilingual AI Bookkeeping for US-LATAM Businesses
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: AI bookkeeping in Spanish + English for 4.7M Hispanic-owned US businesses. $149/mo.
decomposed_models_top_20.entry_wedge: Hispanic Chamber of Commerce + LATAM business communities
decomposed_models_top_20.key_competitor: No bilingual AI-first bookkeeping found.
decomposed_models_top_20.why_now: 4.7M Hispanic-owned businesses in US. Growing rapidly. No tailored solution.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: AI Small Business Acquisition Platform
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: Platform for individual acquirers to find and evaluate small businesses. AI scores automation potential. $299/mo + success fee.
decomposed_models_top_20.entry_wedge: Search fund community + ETA networks
decomposed_models_top_20.key_competitor: BizBuySell (marketplace, no AI scoring). Acquire.com (digital businesses only).
decomposed_models_top_20.why_now: Search fund + ETA boom. 2.34M businesses need succession. AI can identify best targets.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: Manufacturing AI Integration Service for CA SMEs
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: Help 20-150 person CA manufacturers deploy cobots and AI. $50-150K per engagement.
decomposed_models_top_20.entry_wedge: MEP center referrals + cobot distributor partnerships
decomposed_models_top_20.key_competitor: No well-funded AI-specific manufacturing integrator for SMEs.
decomposed_models_top_20.why_now: 98% exploring AI but only 20% prepared. Skills gap is the bottleneck.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: AI Workers' Comp Claims for Regional TPAs
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: AI claims intake and triage for WC TPAs. $5-12 per claim. 80% of WC claims potentially automatable.
decomposed_models_top_20.entry_wedge: SIIA membership + WC industry conferences
decomposed_models_top_20.key_competitor: Avallon (YC S25, $4.6M) is DIRECT competitor with CA TPA customers.
decomposed_models_top_20.why_now: 400K worker attrition by 2026. 1,200+ TPAs need automation.

not_recommended.name: AI Payroll+Bookkeeping Bundle
not_recommended.reason: Gusto ($746M), Rippling ($1.3B), Wave (H&R Block) -- too dominant

not_recommended.name: AI Clinical Documentation for PCPs
not_recommended.reason: Abridge ($250M), Nuance DAX, DeepScribe -- market captured

monitoring.note: Energy cost dependent. Monitor for cheap renewable areas.
Growing niche. Watch for cost/speed improvements.

monitoring.shift: Perez Turning Point / AI Funding Correction
monitoring.note: Goldman $527B hyperscaler capex deepens overhang. Build crash-resilient.
ASSESSED AND DISMISSED: $10.5B funding, 7 unicorns. NOT viable.

structural_shifts_active.note: Enables ALL top 20 service models. Cost advantage ratio STILL WIDENING.
$207B automatable wage bill decomposes into 25+ specific business models across niches.

structural_shifts_active.shift: Robotics x AI Compound Production Cost Compression
structural_shifts_active.note: Decomposes into 6 distinct model types: acquire, integrate, schedule, quote, inspect, rollup.
UPGRADED to very_strong. Bench orphan play scores #1 overall. Most actionable pattern.
Manufacturing + food acquisition models score in top 5 because of supply.
VALIDATED by decomposition: full-service scores highest, tool-layer scores lowest.
NEW PATTERN: Best opportunities are in underserved NICHES of competitive sectors, not sector-level plays.

key_insight: DECOMPOSITION CHANGES THE MAP. Sector-level analysis showed 'SMB Accounting' as one opportunity (score 84). Decomposition reveals it's actually 10+ distinct businesses, ranging from score 80 (Bench orphans) to score 56 (payroll bundle). The RIGHT niche within a sector matters more than the sector itself. Similarly, 'Healthcare Admin AI' is not one business but 8+ niches (prior auth appeals, dental billing, PT denial prevention, credentialing, chart abstraction, etc.) with very different competitive dynamics.

cycle_history.note: First v2 landscape mapping cycle. Services-focused.
EXPANDED SCOPE: Added physical production landscape.
CORRECTION CYCLE: Real data replaces estimates.
QUANTITATIVE DEEPENING: O*NET + BLS data. Stress tests on top 3.

YC-GRANULARITY DECOMPOSITION: 11 sectors -> 102 specific business models. Each scored independently with web research on actual competitors. Top 5 identified. 5 NOT recommended. NEW PATTERN: Niche segmentation > sector analysis.
